urls.title: Inside the White House's bungled effort to combat the coronavirus
urls.description: Trump’s own advisers acknowledged to NBC News that the failure to focus on widespread testing was a major misstep.

text:
@realDonaldTrump "Mismanagement, missed opportunities: 

How the White House bungled the coronavirus response"

"Trump’s own advisers acknowledged to NBC News that the failure to focus on widespread testing was a major misstep."
